text: hey tango and today's tip Tuesday I'm
going to be doing a kitchen experiment
with green onions so I'm going to show
you how you can regrow your own green
onion stalks at home now I've been
meaning to do this for a while now but I
love reading and so I always end up
using the entire stock but the other day
when I showed you guys how to make my
seven later beef recipe I only use the
top green parts of the green onions
leaving the white socks remaining so I
had a choice you can either put your
white socks back in the fridge or you
can try this at home
so how this works is you use your green
onions and scallions like you normally
would and when you come to the end
you'll see that there's this white fruit
now normally you would just toss this
portion of the root but in this case you
want to save your route put it in a
glass mason jar or just a regular glass
and put a little bit of water in it
after a few days your green onions will
start to respray and what's really cool
is after just five days this is what it
looks like you can see that this is the
part that we grew so it's grown about 2
to 3 inches in a matter of 5 days which
is really cool for somebody doesn't cook
with feet it has a lot or or let's say
maybe you only
miso soup every once in a while or fried
rice and you want a little bit of the
top trimmings just to give it a little
bit of pop to your dishes one thing we
want to do is every day or every other
day I really recommend that you change
the water and rinse the roots of your
green onions that way it keeps
everything fresh and healthy and after
trying this at home I feel like this is
a really great way to extend the life of
your green onions and it kind of adds a
little splash of color to your kitchen
window anyways if you're curious on how
tall or how long these little guys will
last for me I've started a blog post and
every few weeks I'll post photos and
updates on how these turn out I hope you
guys enjoyed today's fun little kitchen
experiment and if you've tried me going
your green onions at home post in the
comments below and let me know how it
turned out for you until then I'll see
you guys in my next video bye happy
ending growing
